page.title: 15LEISURE
page.content: Leisure is an important part of our lives today.A lot of people spend their time keeping fit by walking or jogging the Mendip Hills.Because uneployment is low we have less leisure time. We did a survey to see which leisure activites were most popular in our area. Sports were more popular with children than grownups,but it was the most popular all round;while music and craft were close second with children. Fewer adults mentioned music and craft. Children also enjoyed reading but more grown ups mentioned reading. Gardening was favourite with adults. Most men said that they spent their leisure time working on cars. Knitting and sewing were mentioned as being a pastime for some ladies.
